The ChatON logo is different for CANADA

The interaction rank tells you how often you chat with your buddies. You can see the buddies that you chat with the most. Currently, you have not interacted with your buddies yet. Try to chat with your buddies and check your interaction rank in a day
Verification code sent to number below.\n%s
You will receive an automatic call from ChatON. Use the %1$d-digit number you hear during the call to activate your ChatON account. Example voice: Your ChatON code is %2$s. Again %3$s. Thank you
You will receive a %d-digit verification code via SMS or Voice call. Select preferred method
You will receive a %d-digit verification code via SMS
If you do not receive a verification code in %d minutes, resend verification code request
Too many attempts. Try again after %d hours
I would like my birthday to be visible to all ChatON users
Interaction rank informs you how often you chat with your buddies. You have not interacted with your buddies yet. Try to chat with your buddies!
To make voice/video calls, ChatON call must be installed. Install?
Call contact whose log details, contact details, or message details are currently on screen when the device is brought near the face

Enjoy 1 to 1 calls or group calls with others who have installed ChatON V
Your phone number is hidden from buddies who do not have your number in their Contacts. You can change this so that your number is visible to all buddies
After you hide buddies in interaction rank, hidden buddies will be shown
